au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=20m_offset_res
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19300,300) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 60 (for ga high res), 10mm sample ap driveEntRotAp(60) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(37.75, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(37.75, 0) driveBsz(252.5)
